Thank you for visiting SongHyun Investme: Thank you for visiting SongHyun Investment.
welcomeText:
We would like to extend our warmest welcome to you.
 We manage a full spectrum of funds specifically dedicated to each phase of development of small and medium-sized companies.
 Our strategy is to expand from early stage venture to growth and private equity investments as evidenced by our first
 private equity fund of KRW 155 billion (USD 135 million) launched in 2015. At the same time, we plan to expand our investment universe beyond Korea into neighboring countries in Asia.
 We are committed to pursuing mutual growth with the invested companies.
 We bring with us a wealth of management and industry expertise.
 We invite you to join us to embark on the next phase of growth in your company.
managementExperience: SongHyun was built on over 50 years of transparent management philosophy of Hanglas Group and over 40 years of investment experience.
ipoSuccess: Management team of SongHyun has helped over 40 portfolio companies to have a successful IPO and achieved strong growth with its managed funds; Through this, the management of Songhyun has been able to return profits to all concerned parties.
worldClassInvestment: SongHyun aims to become a world-class investment firm which is committed to a long term investment horizon while strengthening its current growth foundation
establishSongHyun: Establish SongHyun Investment (Paid in Capital KRW 20bn)
raiseGrowthLadderSecondFund: Raise ‘2014 SongHyun Growth Ladder 2nd Start-up Fund’ (KRW 16.5bn)
acquireInstitutionalRating: Acquire institutional investor rating ‘A’ from SMBA
